column4: Hey all, I set a line in etc/network/interfaces to: iface eth0 inet static as it was previously dynamic and the IP kept changing. I also set the fixed IP and netmask. But now I can't seem to communicate with the outside world - stuff like wget no longer works. Am I missing something?
Would I need to set default gateway as well?
if you set a static ip yeas, because dhcp is no longer setting that for you
Gotcha, that seems to have fixed it, thankyou
